name: EQUALS DAY
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the =DOW() function for numeric day of week, or =CDOW() for alphanumeric day.

parameters.name: recv_field
parameters.description: The field that is going to receive the day value. If the receiving field is A type then the result is the character day of week. If the receiving field is numeric the result is the day ofweek number.

parameters.name: date_field
parameters.description: The field containing the date value to use for calculating the day.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Equals Day.
